title: Stormi picks out her first pumpkin! Kylie Jenner's daughter is seen running free at the patch
text:
Stormi was picking out her first pumpkin on Wednesday afternoon.

The one-year-old child, who was only a small baby last year, seemed to enjoy running around the spacious pumpkin patch as her mother Kylie Jenner looked on.

Missing from the scene was Stormi's father Travis Scott, who split from the makeup mogul this summer. He doesn't appear to be staying home to ease his broken heart, however, as last night the rapper was spotted partying at Bootsy Bellows in West Hollywood until late in the night.

Trick or treat: Stormi was picking out her first pumpkin on Wednesday afternoon. The one-year-old child, who was only a small baby last year, seemed to enjoy running around the spacious pumpkin patch as her mother Kylie Jenner looked on

Sweet child: Stormi was cute in her Halloween themed outfit. The child had on what appeared to be grey pajamas with little light orange and dark orange Jack O Lanterns

It was the first time the Astroworld musician had been seen since he injured his knee on stage.

Stormi, who was born February 1, 2018, was cute in her Halloween themed outfit. The child had on what appeared to be grey pajamas with little light orange and dark orange Jack O Lanterns.

Kris Jenner's granddaughter added white sneakers by Nike and socks.

The budding TV star also wore her hair parted in the middle.

No tight dresses on this outing! Kylie was more casual than usual as she had on a white T-shirt with rolled-up jeans and an orange sweater tied around her waist

Kylie was more casual than usual as she had on a white T-shirt with rolled-up jeans and an orange sweater tied around her waist.

The Forbes cover girl had her long raven locks worn down over her shoulders. Also long were her light pink nails.

The mother-daughter duo were seen sitting on a plaid blanket over a bushel of hay as they were surrounded by orange and green pumpkins.

Cousin time! Also seen at the patch was Khloe Kardashian's daughter True, who wore blue. And Rob Kardashian and Blac Chyna's daughter Dream could also be seen. She was in beige and brown

Stormi is ready to drive: The little girl was at the wheel of a tractor as True looked apprehensive

She sure can run fast: Little Stormi took off and ran away from her mom as she headed for the hills solo

The patch was likely located near her Hidden Hills, California mansion as there were bare hills all around them.

Hidden Hills is about 45 minutes north west of the hustle and bustle of Beverly Hills.

Also seen at the patch was Khloe Kardashian's daughter True, who wore blue.

And Rob Kardashian and Blac Chyna's daughter Dream could also be seen. She was in beige and brown.

She liked the smaller ones: Here the child was seen picking up a smaller pumpkin with one hand

Party time: Missing from the scene was Stormi's father Travis Scott, who split from the makeup mogul this summer. He doesn't appear to be staying home to ease his broken heart, however, as last night the rapper was spotted partying at Bootsy Bellows in West Hollywood

The night before, when Travis was out partying, Kylie was baking.

On Tuesday evening the Life Of Kylie star shared a photo of a plate of Halloween cupcakes she made in the kitchen of her Hidden Hills, California mansion.

They looked almost professionally made.

Mommy mode: The 22-year-old siren still finds time to do everyday things at home like bake for her little daughter Stormi, aged one, who she had with ex Travis Scott

The cupcakes looked like they were professionally made as they were presented on a black tray atop a marble table.

Some had a pumpkin top with orange frosting and black accents.

Others looked like little mummies with white straps and back around the eyes. Then there were the black bat cupcakes.

Sugar rush: The cupcakes looked like they were professionally made as they were presented on a black tray atop a marble table. Some had a pumpkin top with orange frosting and black accents. Others looked like little mummies with white straps and back around the eyes. Then there were the black bat cupcakes

This is not the first time she has celebrated Halloween this year.

Earlier in the week Kylie dressed her dogs in Halloween costumes; she has several greyhounds.

One was dressed as Woody from Toy Story as another had on a Buzz Lightyear outfit. A third was in a pink tutu which may have been the Little Bo-Peep costume.

Woof: This is not the first time she has celebrated Halloween this year. Earlier in the week Kylie dressed her dogs in Halloween costumes; she has several greyhounds

Bark: One was dressed as Woody from Toy Story as another had on a Buzz Lightyear outfit. A third was in a pink tutu

Last year Kylie went to town to dress up for Halloween.

The siren wore a Victoria's Secret outfit complete with wings as she joined sisters Khloe and Kendall, Kourtney and Kim.

And then the CEO dressed up as a butterfly in pink; her daughter Stormi had a matching outfit.
description: The one-year-old child, who was only a small baby last year, seemed to enjoy running around the spacious pumpkin patch as her mother Kylie Jenner looked on.
